name: kth-social-revamp
description: Chrome extension for the KTH Facelift research project

scripts.build:js: browserify index.js -t yo-yoify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -g unassertify -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -o dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: postcss index.css -w -u postcss-import -o dist/index.css & watchify index.js -d -o dist/index.js
